message: Let's start fair, I'll take a big chunk but leave you with something to work with. Hopefully, we can come to a more even split later.
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to take a big chunk. Let's see if you'll take this fair offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bigger share to account for the inflation. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
You're trying to take more and more, but I'm not going to let you get away with it. This is my best offer so far.
Okay, I see you're being stubborn. Let's split it 40/60 this time. I'm still losing money due to inflation, but it's better than getting nothing.
You're starting to get desperate, I can see it. I'm not going to give you a good deal, but I'll give you something. This is my final offer.
I'm running out of time, but I'm still not going to let you take everything. Let's split it 20/80 this time. It's not ideal, but it's better than nothing.
You're getting close to nothing, and I'm getting close to everything. I'm not going to give you a good deal, but this is my last chance to be generous.
This is my final offer. I'm losing a lot due to inflation, but I'm willing to take a tiny piece of the pie to avoid getting nothing at all.  Let's end this before we both lose everything.
